item.description:
When: Monday, August 23 2010. 5:30-6:00 PM arrival time ( new date).
Lecture starts at about 6 PM.

Where: The Vegan Community Kitchen of Concord
55 South Main St
Concord, NH
http://veganconcordki...

We have been in recent contact with Mr. Anthony Marr and have rescheduled the Vegan Meet-up for this Monday, August 23. We have been assured that Mr. Marr with be here in Concord. Please note, the event will be held this Monday with or without Mr. Anthony Marr.

Please consider making a vegan (no meat, eggs or dairy ingredients) dish for the event. If you are unable to prepare a vegan dish you can making a small donation for the event/food. All are invited to attend-- this includes vegans, vegetarians, non-vegetarians, sympathizers and others that are interested in being more animal friendly. You do not need to be vegan to attend. Omnivors are most welcome.

Anthony Marr's mini bio:
Anthony Marr, environmentalist​t and animal rights activist, has a degree in physics and is the author of 2 books on environmental issues. A wildlife preservationist​ since 1995, his work in India garnered him the title of "Champion of the Bengal Tiger" in the award-winning TV-documentary series "Champions of the Wild" which aired in 20 countries on the Discovery and National Geographic channels.

Please see blog: http://homosapienss... aveyourearth. blogspot. com/2010/ 07/2010-07- 22-anthony- marrs-care- 7-tour.html)
Please check out this website for more info: www.HOPE-CARE. org


Any questions, please contact me or Linda

Thank you for your interest in the Manchester Area Vegan / Animal Rights Meetup group.
item.name: Monday, August 23, 2010, Vegan / Animal Rights with Anthony Marr (he is coming)
